blocks.name: bj-consensus
blocks.content: Version of ~ consensus expressed using the conditional operator. (Remark: it may be better to express it as ~ consensus , using only binary connectives, and hinting at the fact that it is a Boolean algebra identity, like the absorption identities.) (Contributed by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-dfifc2
blocks.content: This should be the alternate definition of "ifc" if "if-" enters the main part. (Contributed by BJ, 20-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-dfifc2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(cif(c0, c1, w0), cab(s0, wo(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wn(w0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtri(cif(c0, c1, w0), cab(s0, wo(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wn(w0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), cab(s0, wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(w0)))))
  df-if(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  abbii(s0, wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(w0))), wo(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wn(w0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  bicomi(wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(w0))), wo(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wn(w0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  orbi12i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wn(w0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(w0)))
  ancom(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  ancom(wn(w0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
}
